14 template<typename T>
15 struct with_data_t {
16 T &val;
17
18 with_data_t(T &val): val(val) { }
19 with_data_t(T &&val): val(val) { }
20
21 const auto &get_selection() const {
22 return selection;
23 }
24 protected:
